content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the correctness of the programs?

choices.label: Program I correctly moves the robot to the gray square, but program II does not.
Program II correctly moves the robot to the gray square, but program I does not.
Both program I and program II correctly move the robot to the gray square.
Neither program I nor program II correctly moves the robot to the gray square.

content.answer: Both program I and program II correctly move the robot to the gray square.
